dmca.title: Dummies on Dilution
dmca.body:
You can read the full text of IDG's C&D letter, and my response,
at http://www.ucolick.org/~de/idgNonsense.html.

here is the text of the letter I received:

====================================================================

Dear (Private),

Your web site at http://www.ucolick.org/%7Ede/CVSbeginner.html entitled "A Real Beginner's Guide to CVS, a document that is affectionately known as "CVS for Dummies" was brought to my attention.

I have reviewed the site and found it very interesting and educational.  Unfortunately, it utilizes the phrase "for Dummies" which is confusingly similar to the well-known trademark owned by IDG Books. "...For Dummies
